description: A list of Serviceability Request resources with additional meta information.
title: serviceabilityRequestList

$eref.description: Specifies relationships between the current document and an external resource.
$eref.title: link

___href.description: A URL. Specifies the location of the linked document.

___type.description: Specifies the media type of the linked document.

___title.description: Provide additional / advisory information (expand on the meaning of the link).

___method.description: Specifies how to send the data (e.g. get, post).

___rel.description: Specifies the relationship between the current document and the linked document.

___link.description: A self referencing link to the collection.

___returned.description: The number of items returned for this collection.

___available.description: The number of items available for this collection.

___serviceabilityRequests.description: An array for Serviceability Request items.

$eref.description: A request by an organization (buyer) to  another ogranization (seller) to determine Serviceability at a specific location.
$eref.title: serviceabilityRequest

___projectId.description: An identifier that is used to group Orders that represent a unit of functionality that is important to a Buyer. A Project can be used to relate multiple Orders together.

___status.description: The states used to convey Serviceability Request Status.

___desiredResponseDate.description: The desired date for a response to the serviceability request formatted as  YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).

___createdAt.description: The date object was created formatted as  YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).

___serviceDetail.description: Details of the service capabilities being requested.

___pricingReference.description: The value associated with the Pricing Method selected (e.g. a contract or tariff id).

___updatedAt.description: The date object was last upldated formatted as  YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).

___sellerId.description: An organization that provides products and services to a buyer. Specifically, the ID of the Partner/Access Provider (Seller) organization receiving the serviceability request.

___pricingMethod.description: The pricing authority to be used to price the service details on this serviceability request. Choice of Tariff, Contract, Individual Case Basis (ICB), Other.

___serviceSite.description: The service site information for the serviceability request.

___buyerId.description: A Party Role played by an Individual or an Organization that buys products and services from a Seller. Specifically, the ID of the Service Provider (Buyer) organization placing the serviceability request.

___alternateSiteContact.description: The secondary site contact for the serviceability request.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, serviceabilityRequest.

___primarySiteContact.description: The primary site contact for the serviceability request.
